data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Longleng.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Longleng, Nagaland, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Longleng, Nagaland, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.section_summary: On average, 4 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Longleng, Nagaland, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Longleng. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: There are 50,500 people living in the county of Longleng. Only about 556 might be believers.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Loi people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, encourage your church in Longleng that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Longleng, Nagaland, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.section_summary:
the county of Longleng, Nagaland, India has a population of 50,500.

We estimate Longleng has 556 people who might know Jesus, 613 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 49,332 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Longleng, Nagaland, India to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist
